title: Change LeaverBuster
body:
Ok...First I have High ping.... 2000-27000 these daysss and I AM FORCED TO LEAVE THE GAME............ well the leaverbuster doesn't know about high ping and SET ME UP TO a 20 MINUTEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE QUEUE .... pls change this for higher pings... knda unfair......... just a suggestion im not angry or so :/
{{champion:24}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: You're right that [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) doesn't take into account if a leave was intentional or not because they still cause others a negative experience.   Your network definitely sounds like it's having problems having a strong connection to our game server, and causing your ping to stay high.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to improve that and get back in game.  Test it out in customs to prevent penalties, though.  I hope that helps!
